Texts.Eng: Thank you for retrieving these modules, ambassador. They will prove invaluable to our researchers. Here is the reward I promised you: some new casings for your own Matter Manipulator.

The Alliance would very much like to study the Matter Manipulator you received from the Protectorate. ^green;I want you to retrieve ^orange;20 Manipulator Modules ^green;so that our researchers can start investigating the technology. ^reset;In the mean time, I will ask them to start working on a small reward for you.
